item.content:encoded:
Happy Mother’s Day Badass from your French Bulldog Card

Best Deals! Happy Mother’s Day Badass from your French Bulldog Card – Mothers Day Cards This item is trending! Happy Mother’s Day Badass from your French Bulldog Card good product Happy Mother’s Day Badass from your French Bulldog Card There are many featuresHappy Mother’s Day Badass from your French Bulldog Dog Card with love and affection. Your French Bulldog dog wants to be a badass just like YOU, his dog mommy. He wears a red polka dot bandana tied up around his head and signature red glasses just like yours. His pink and red paw prints have a heart shape for one of the toes. Inside is a red polka dot left page and a heart warming message on the left. You are so admired, you are vibrant, strong, patient and amazing besides being the best dog mom ever. All of the text is editable just use the "personalize" option. Please remember to change the dog’s name to your dog’s name. You will find more than 30 more breeds just like this one with red bandanas and glasses in our "Badass Cards and Gifts from Your Dog" Collection. You will also find a red bandana, just like the one on the card that you can personalize a bandana buy and get your picture taken with your French Bulldog dog! Truly the most unique Mother’s Day Card in a long time. Price:$4.17
